marketNews.title: Strategy to Survive When Your Portfolio Turns Red
marketNews.content: Portofolio merah (portfolio turning red) is not a loss, the loss is when you panic and sell. - illusix

tickerNews.title: PANI Announces Rights Issue Execution Price at IDR 15,000 per Share
tickerNews.content: Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua ($PANI) announced the execution price of its rights issue at 15,000 rupiah per share, approximately +7.14% higher than PANI's stock price at the close of trading on Tuesday (10/14) at 14,000 rupiah per share. Through this corporate action, PANI will issue up to ~1.12 billion new shares or equivalent to ~6.19% of shares post-rights issue, resulting in a maximum potential raised fund of 16.73 trillion rupiah. The rights ratio is 119,169:7,864. The maximum potential fund from this rights issue is in line with our previous assumptions. The number of new shares to be issued is lower than the maximum announced in previous information disclosure, causing the execution price to be above the minimum price. PANI's main shareholder, PT Multi Artha Pratama, stated that it will exercise all or part of the rights belonging to it, amounting to 979,229,045 shares, after first attempting to transfer/place some of these rights to investors and/or the public. The funds obtained will be used by PANI for: - 16.125 trillion rupiah or ~96% to purchase up to 44.1% of Bangun Kosambi Sukses ($CBDK) shares from PT Agung Sedayu and PT Tunas Mekar Jaya. - The remaining approximately 608 billion rupiah or ~4% for additional subscription of new shares to be issued by 3 subsidiary entities, namely CISN, KUS, and PET. These funds will then be used for capital expenditure. The cum-rights date in the regular and negotiated markets is November 25, 2025, while the rights trading period is scheduled from December 1-5, 2025.

tickerNews.title: CTRA 9M25: Marketing Sales -12% YoY, Revising Down 2025 Target
tickerNews.content: $CTRA: Ciputra Development recorded marketing sales of approximately 1.9 trillion rupiah in 3Q25 (-28% YoY, -28% QoQ), bringing marketing sales for 9M25 to approximately 7.6 trillion rupiah (-12% YoY). CTRA also revised down its marketing sales target for 2025 from 11 trillion rupiah to 10 trillion rupiah, meaning the achievement for 9M25 reached ~76% of the new 2025 target. The house and land plot segment contributed 88% of total marketing sales during 9M25, followed by the shophouse segment (9%), apartment (3%), and office (1%). Approximately 30% of marketing sales in 9M25 came from products eligible for PPN DTP (VAT Exemptions). $PWON: Pakuwon Jati recorded marketing sales of approximately 300 billion rupiah in 3Q25 (-16% YoY, +10% QoQ). This result brought marketing sales for 9M25 to approximately 903 billion rupiah (-20% YoY), equivalent to ~50% of the 2025 target of 1.8 trillion rupiah. The largest marketing sales contribution came from the condominium segment (57.4%), followed by landed houses (41.5%), and offices (1.2%). 73% of marketing sales in 9M25 came from products eligible for PPN DTP. $ANTM: The Director General at the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM), Tri Winarno, stated that the government is assessing the possibility of applying a Domestic Market Obligation (DMO) scheme for the gold commodity. This plan is aimed at reducing Aneka Tambang's dependence on gold imports, which reach approximately 30 tons per year as raw material for precious metal production. $BBTN: The President Director of Bank Tabungan Negara, Nixon LP Napitupulu, targeted that the government's liquidity injection of 25 trillion rupiah will be fully absorbed by November 2025. Nixon explained that the relatively slow absorption is due to the more complex characteristics of KPR (Mortgage Loans) compared to general credit, starting from the verification stage to credit approval. Furthermore, the disbursed ceiling is smaller because the majority of BBTN's credit portfolio is directed towards the retail segment. According to Nixon, the available credit pipeline has reached 27.5 trillion rupiah across several segments. Nixon's statement came after the Minister of Finance, Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa, planned to move 15 trillion rupiah of liquidity fund at BBTN due to low credit disbursement realization at 19% as of October 9, 2025. $ENRG: Energi Mega Persada announced that PT Samuel International has absorbed part of the new shares offered in the private placement. PT Samuel International has absorbed 350 million (1.3%) new ENRG shares at an execution price of 770 rupiah per share, totaling approximately 269.5 billion rupiah. Besides PT Samuel International, PT Bakrie Capital Indonesia also absorbed ~1.2 billion (4.5%) new ENRG shares at a price of 288 rupiah per share in July 2025. ENRG itself announced a private placement plan in May 2025 for up to ~2.5 billion (10%) new shares with a dilution effect of up to 9.09%. $DADA: Diamond Citra Propertindo's controller, PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia, sold 145 million DADA shares with an average price of 167 rupiah per share on October 8, 2025. The total transaction value reached approximately 24.3 billion rupiah. After this transaction, the ownership of PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia in DADA decreased from 58.57% to 56.62%. $LOPI: Logisticsplus International announced that its subsidiary, PT Wibowo Manajemen Indonesia, won a contract for the procurement of concierge services valued at approximately 42.4 billion rupiah. The contract is valid for 12 months plus 50 calendar days from the signing of the cooperation agreement on October 13, 2025.

tickerNews.title: China Imposes Sanctions on US-Linked Units of South Korean Shipbuilder Hanwha
tickerNews.content: The Chinese government on Tuesday (10/14) announced sanctions against 5 subsidiaries owned by South Korean shipbuilder Hanwha Ocean Co. Ltd. (KRX: 042660), which are linked to the US. These sanctions include prohibiting organizations and individuals in China from conducting transactions, cooperation, or activities related to Hanwha Ocean's business units. Reuters reported that the sanctions imposed by the Chinese government coincided with the implementation of special port fees imposed by the US and China for ships from each respective country. Bloomberg reported that the dispute between the US and China in the shipping sector could have implications for the global economy, considering that ships account for more than 80% of international trade transportation.

tickerNews.title: Gold Price Hits New All-Time High Amid US-China Trade Tensions
tickerNews.content: The spot gold price briefly surged +1.52% to 4,180 US dollars per troy ounce during intraday trading on Tuesday (10/14), marking a new all-time high, before weakening to 4,126 US dollars per troy ounce (+0.38%). Reuters reported that the rise in gold prices was triggered by US-China trade tensions and expectations of a US interest rate cut.

tickerNews.title: Ministry of Finance Announces State Budget Deficit 371.5 Trillion Rupiah per 9M25
tickerNews.content: The Ministry of Finance on Tuesday (10/14) announced that the State Budget (APBN) deficit for 2025 as of 9M25 reached 371.5 trillion rupiah, equivalent to 1.56% of GDP (vs. 9M24: 1.1% deficit to GDP), still below the 2025 outlook which projects a deficit of 2.78% of GDP. This result was influenced by state revenue which fell -7.2% YoY to 1,863.3 trillion rupiah, equivalent to 65% of the 2025 outlook, suppressed by a tax revenue decrease of -4.4% YoY. Meanwhile, state expenditure contracted -0.8% YoY to 2,234.8 trillion rupiah, equivalent to 63.4% of the 2025 outlook. The 2025 APBN still recorded a primary balance surplus of 18 trillion rupiah during 9M25 (vs. 9M24: 118.1 trillion rupiah surplus).

tickerNews.title: Finance Minister Considers Further Liquidity Injection to State Banks (Himbara)
tickerNews.content: The Minister of Finance, Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa, stated on Monday (10/13) that the government is considering injecting more liquidity into the state-owned bank holding company (Himbara), although he did not specify the amount further. Purbaya added that the government is still assessing the impact of the 200 trillion rupiah liquidity injection into Himbara in September 2025. Purbaya explained that the government currently holds 250 trillion rupiah stored at Bank Indonesia.

tickerNews.title: Government to Evaluate Export Proceeds (DHE SDA) Policy Due to Technical Constraints and Insignificant Impact on Foreign Reserves
tickerNews.content: The Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs, Airlangga Hartarto, stated on Monday (10/13) that the government would evaluate the policy for export proceeds from natural resources (DHE SDA) because its implementation faced technical constraints several months after it started running. In a separate event on the same day, the Minister of Finance, Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa, mentioned that the government would review the DHE SDA policy because its implementation was considered not to have provided a significant impact on increasing the country's foreign exchange reserves.

tickerNews.title: National Nutrition Agency to Return IDR 70 Trillion Budget for Free Nutritious Meals Program Due to Low Absorption Rate
tickerNews.content: The Head of the National Nutrition Agency, Dadan Hindayana, stated on Tuesday (10/14) that his agency would return 70 trillion rupiah of the Free Nutritious Meals (MBG) program budget to the government due to a low absorption rate. For context, the MBG budget for this year reached 71 trillion rupiah with a potential addition of 100 trillion rupiah, totaling 171 trillion rupiah. As of October 3, 2025, the realization of MBG budget absorption was recorded at 20.6 trillion rupiah, equivalent to 29% of the ceiling of 71 trillion rupiah.

tickerNews.title: Clove Plantation in Lampung Contaminated with Cesium 137
tickerNews.content: The government task force on Monday (10/13) announced that a clove plantation in Lampung has been contaminated with the radioactive isotope Cesium 137, but its presence is limited and has not spread to other commodities. Cloves from the plantation in Lampung will not be sold until further laboratory testing is completed, but the task force did not provide further details regarding the plantation. Previously, the drug and food control agency in the US (FDA) found suspected radioactive contamination in clove products originating from Indonesia. Following these findings, the task force spokesperson, Bara Hasibuan, said that the team was sent to inspect 3 locations, including processing facilities in Surabaya and plantations in Pati and Lampung. Last week, the task force stated that it had found traces of Cesium 137 in 22 factories in the Modern Cikande Industrial Estate.

tickerNews.title: Formosa Ingredient Factory (BOBA) to Distribute Interim Dividend for Fiscal Year 2025
tickerNews.content: Formosa Ingredient Factory ($BOBA) will distribute an interim dividend for the 2025 fiscal year amounting to 2 rupiah per share, indicating a dividend yield of ~1.1% as of Tuesday (10/14). The cum date in the regular and negotiated markets is October 21, 2025, while the payment date is November 10, 2025.
